document.docAuthor: Pagliosa, Paulo Roberto, Doria, João Gabriel, Alves, Giorgia Freitas, Almeida, Tito Cesar Marques De, Lorenzi, Luciano, Netto, Sergio Antonio & Lana, Paulo Da Cunha
document.masterDocTitle: Polychaetes from Santa Catarina State (southern Brazil): checklist and remarks on species distribution

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Polychaetes from Santa Catarina State (southern Brazil): checklist and remarks on species distribution

subSubSection.paragraph: Environment: Middle continental shelf Depth: 49 m

Species:
Naineris aurantiaca (Müller 1858 )
References: Müller ( 1858 ) as
Theodisca aurantiaca .
Environment: unknown
Note: Specimens from the type locality are needed to elucidate the taxonomical position of this species.

Species:
Naineris setosa (Verrill 1900 )
References: Souza ( 2008 ) Environment: Bay

Species:
Orbinia cf. latreillii (Audouin & Milne-Edwards 1833 )
References: Souza ( 2008 )

Note: This material needs to be revised, since
O . latreilli
is most probably a species complex.
References: Bolivar ( 1990 ), Almeida et al . ( 2012 ) Environment: Inner continental shelf, middle continental shelf Depth: 10–38 m
Environment: Middle continental shelf Depth: 49 m
Note: This material needs to be revised. It is probably a new species.

Species:
Scoloplos (Leodamas) ohlini Ehlers ( 1901 )
References: Bolivar ( 1990 )
Environment: Bay, inner continental shelf, middle continental shelf Depth: 28–50 m

Species:
Scoloplos (Leodamas) verax Kinberg 1866
References: Bolivar ( 1990 )

Species:
Scoloplos capensis Day
References: Souza ( 2008 ) as
Scoloplos (Scoloplos) capensis .
Environment: Bay

Species:
Scoloplos robustus Rullier 1964
References: Souza ( 2008 ) as
Leitoscoloplos robustus .
Environment: Bay

Species:
Scoloplos rubra (Webster 1879 )
References: Coelho ( 1992 ) as
Scoloplos (Leodamas) rubra .
Environment: Tidal flat, estuarine beach Depth: Intertidal
Environment: Outer continental shelf, continental slope
